title: Covid death toll moves up with 26 new fatalities
content: The Director-General of Health Services has confirmed another 26 coronavirus-related deaths for February 24, pushing the countryâ€™s death toll from the pandemic to 16,142.The deaths reported today include 13 males and 13 females, according to the figures released by the Department of Govt. Information. Six of the victims are between the ages of 30-59 years. The remaining 20 are in the age group of 60 years and above.
